basics.summary: I am a software developer living on aboriginal land, of the Wangal people of the Eora nation. I am passionate about Open Source, usability &

work.company: Faculty of Medicine - USYD | NSW Health | Eora/Sydney
work.summary: Translating high-volume, routinely collected electronic medical records into high-value research data to improve patient outcomes
highlights: Design + implementation of highly scalable data pipeline, and data processing/cleaning/visualization software
Co-ordination + Liasing with analysts, engineers, clinicians and government stakeholders in the health sector.
UX focused design + implementation of clinical validation web-app for clinicians to rapidly label/validate patient records/datasets.
Focus on ergonomics, discoverability & home-row navigation to reduce friction & increase productivity in rapidly traversing datasets

work.company: USYD | School of Computer Science | School of Electrical Eng. | Eora/Sydney
work.summary: Systems Programming, Algorithms & Data Structures, Intro to programming, Embedded Systems, Infomatics
highlights: Teach software engineering fundamentals at a variety of levels & domains.
Concurrency & system programming in C within *NIX
Data Structure + Algo design, analysis, implementation
Programming fundamentals in Python - idioms, OOP, specification breakdown, testcase design
Embedded Systems in C++ - Registry manipulation of ARM microprocessor, assembly, signal processing in embedded systems
Chart Theory / Information Design - Data Quality/Ethics
Design and implementation of powerful data-transformation/analysis programs and scripts using Python, R
Algorithmically distinguished occurrences of bacteraemia from false-positives in datasets with >94% accuracy.
Vital role in successful use-case demo for eMR data-warehouse migration
